snippet: The owner of three Manhattan kosher restaurants is opening a market on the Upper East Side with a butcher shop and bakery.
abstract: The owner of three Manhattan kosher restaurants is opening a market on the Upper East Side with a butcher shop and bakery.

headline.main: Prime Butcher Baker, a New Kosher Market
headline.print_headline: Food Stuff: Kosher Foods, for Cooks And Noncooks
